title: League reduces internet speed?
body: Hi guys, I got a problem than everytime I play league my internet speed goes down from 5~8xx mbps to 2x mbps. It was still perfectly fine even I am in queue or champ selection, but it drops right after the game started with the loading screen. Does anyone has the same issue or can offer me any help? Sorry for my bad English =[

replies.body: You might have a weak network or hardware issue that isn't tuned up to support League's constant connection requirement.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up the strength of your connection.  Hope that helps!
